hero.subtitle: Real Client Case Study
hero.title: Chic Boutique: Turning aesthetic into performance.
hero.description: Chic Boutique is a fashion eCommerce brand with strong visual identity — but weak digital performance. This project focused on conversion, clarity, and confidence.

context.description: The brand already had traffic from Instagram and ads. The real issue was what happened after users landed. Drop-offs were high, especially on mobile.

points: Homepage overwhelmed users with too many choices
Product discovery felt slow and unclear
Visual quality was high, but trust signals were missing

strategy.description: Instead of adding features, I focused on reducing cognitive load. Every screen had to guide the user to the next confident action.

implementation.description: The site was built using a modern, component-driven architecture focused on performance and maintainability.
points: Next.js for routing, SEO, and performance

reflection.title: The biggest lesson? Good design is not decoration — it’s direction.
reflection.description: This project reinforced the idea that clarity beats complexity. When users feel guided, conversion follows naturally.

hero.subtitle: Real Client Case Study
hero.title: Fashion Hub: Connecting style with convenience
hero.description: Fashion Hub is a retail eCommerce brand. This project focused on improving conversions and making the user journey smoother.

context.description: The client struggled with high bounce rates and inconsistent design across pages.

points: High bounce rate on product pages
Low conversion due to poor filtering options

strategy.description: Focused on clarity, trust, and speed to increase conversions.

implementation.description: Built a fast, responsive, and intuitive platform.

reflection.title: The biggest lesson? Clarity and speed drive conversion.
reflection.description: Simpler design with clear CTAs leads to happier users and better results.
